description: When a hip-hop promoter is bailed out of a hefty debt by a club owner, he becomes one of her call boys and nearly loses his life in the process.
name: Trois 3: The Escort

review.name: A Must See for All Brian White Fanatics!!!
review.reviewBody: After his appearance in Mr 3000, I was blown away by Brian White, which led me to seek out other films in his filmography. Well, to my surprise and delight I found Trois 3 and watched it FOUR times within TWO days!! It is very well made! Too bad this wasn't shown in the main theaters. Brian White is simply the most gorgeous man ever made, EVER!!! This film, besides the excellent cast, particularly one of my favorite actors Isaiah Washington, is very well made from a cinematography viewpoint. The director put it down on the real! At first, I was taken aback but upon the 2nd, 3rd, & 4th viewing, I got what he is trying to do. Reagan is right when she says you have to see it TWICE, at the very least. I believe once you see it, you will want to see it MORE than twice, like me! I bought this DVD sight unseen and its the best purchase EVER!!! I HIGHLY recommend it.
